prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Fairfax County (Va.) Commissioner's Report, 1867. Local government records collection, Fairfax County (Va.) Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came to the Library of Virginia under accession number 37235.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Fairfax County was named for Thomas Fairfax, sixth baron Fairfax of Cameron, proprietor of the Northern Neck. It was formed from Prince William County in 1742.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Fairfax County (Va.) Commissioner's Report, 1867. The report pertains to Francis L. Smith's administration of the will of Aaron Leggett.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Fairfax County Wills can be found on microfilm at the Library of Virginia. Consult "A Guide to Virginia County and City Records on Microfilm" on the Library of Virginia web site.

controlaccess.head: Genre and Form Terms:
controlaccess.genreform: Local government records -- Virginia -- Fairfax County.
